Aidan M. Dodson, John J. Johnston & Wendy Monkhouse (edd.), Demotic Consultant C.J. Martin, A Good Scribe and an Exceedingly Wise Man. Studies in Honour of W.J. Tait = GHP Egyptology. 21.
London, Golden House Publications, 2014, 4°, xviii-330 pp., 1 portrait, figg. ISBN 978-1-906137-33-5. £60.
